QuestData.Title: No Time to Waste
QuestData.Description: We're in luck, commander. The antidote is relatively easy tae make.$B$BI've made a small amount with what I had on me. You should take it tae Kolrigg before it's too late. It'll keep him alive long enough for me tae make more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Administer the Spiresalve to Kolrigg Stoktron in Southport.
QuestData.RewardText: By Muradin's beard... what a headache...
